help.p: Universities help to increase your technology level. In the process they consume goods and jobs. They produce more than schools for a given goods/jobs input. However, they use a lot of these and also cost quite a lot of money to run, so you should have the economic and industrial capacity to supply them.
You will need a number of universities to achieve a tech level close to 100%
Universities do not need to be connected to transport; they can get all thier requirements from markets (which must be in range and have goods and jobs available).
You must have 5 schools PER university to supply it with students.
